recordLookups.description: updated this to include the fsl Enabled office unit only.
recordLookups.name: get_Unit_records
recordLookups.label: get Unit records

textTemplates.name: emaiBody48hrs
textTemplates.text:
The following units have been identified as "Shutdown" from a Callback closeout for >= 2 days.


Your FE & SRFOM will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 5 days.

Your RGM & RFOM will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 14 days.

Your VP will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 21 days. 

A list of units left "Shutdown" for >= 30 days will be emailed to the President of Otis North America.


Units Left Shutdown Over 2 Days

{!table48hrs}

textTemplates.name: emailBody14days_1
textTemplates.text:
The following units have been identified as "Shutdown" from a Callback closeout for >= 14 days.


Your VP will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 21 days. 

A list of units left "Shutdown" for >= 30 days will be emailed to the President of Otis North America.


Units Left Shutdown Over 14 Days

{!table14days_1}

textTemplates.name: emailBody14days_2
textTemplates.text:
The following units have been identified as "Shutdown" from a Callback closeout for >= 14 days.


Your VP will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 21 days. 

A list of units left "Shutdown" for >= 30 days will be emailed to the President of Otis North America.


Units Left Shutdown Over 14 Days

{!table14days_2}

textTemplates.name: emailBody21days_1
textTemplates.text:
The following units have been identified as "Shutdown" from a Callback closeout for >= 21 days.


A list of units left "Shutdown" for >= 30 days will be emailed to the President of Otis North America.


Units Left Shutdown Over 21 Days

{!table21days_1}﻿

textTemplates.name: emailBody21days_2
textTemplates.text:
The following units have been identified as "Shutdown" from a Callback closeout for >= 21 days.


A list of units left "Shutdown" for >= 30 days will be emailed to the President of Otis North America.


Units Left Shutdown Over 21 Days

{!table21days_2}﻿

textTemplates.name: emailBody24hrs
textTemplates.text:
The following units have been identified as "Shutdown" from a Callback closeout for >= 1 days.


Your BM will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 2 days.

Your FE & SRFOM will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 5 days.

Your RGM & RFOM will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 14 days.

Your VP will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 21 days.

A list of units left "Shutdown" for >= 30 days will be emailed to the President of Otis North America.


Units Left Shutdown for 1 Day

{!table24hrs}

textTemplates.name: emailBody30days
textTemplates.text:
The following units have been identified as "Shutdown" from a Callback closeout for >= 30 days.


Units Left Shutdown Over 30 Days

{!table30days}﻿

textTemplates.name: emailBody5days
textTemplates.text:
The following units have been identified as "Shutdown" from a Callback closeout for >= 5 days.


Your RGM & RFOM will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 14 days.

Your VP will receive an email of all units on this list that have been "Shutdown" for >= 21 days. 

A list of units left "Shutdown" for >= 30 days will be emailed to the President of Otis North America.


Units Left Shutdown Over 5 Days

{!table5days}

value.stringValue: ALERT: Units Left "Shutdown" for more than 14 days
ALERT: Units Left "Shutdown" for more than 21 days
ALERT: Units Left "Shutdown" for more than 30 days
ALERT: Units Left "Shutdown" for more than 2 days
ALERT: Units Left "Shutdown" for more than 5days.
